CustomField.formula: IF(PDRI__Root__c, IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d",HYPERLINK("/?sort=" & Name , "") & HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/sObject/" & Id & "/view", Name, "_self") ,HYPERLINK("/?sort=" & Name , "") & HYPERLINK("/"&Id, Name, "_self") ) , IF($User.UIThemeDisplayed="Theme4d",HYPERLINK("/?sort=" & PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Name, "") & HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/sObject/" & PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Id & "/view", PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Name, "_self"), HYPERLINK("/?sort=" & PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Name, "") & HYPERLINK("/"&PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Id, PDRI__Root_Data_Set__r.Name, "_self")) )
CustomField.label: Data Set Name
